title: Three arrested with KG at Omanthai Post
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka Police arrested three suspects with a stock of Kerala Cannabis at the Omanthai Police checkpoint.
Police Spokesperson, SSP Attorney-at-Law Nihal Thalduwa said the arrests were made, while the suspects were transporting the stock of narcotics in a vehicle.
Police seized over 8 kilograms of Kerala Cannabis from the possession of the suspects.
